BannerSection.heading: Ai Generated Image
BannerSection.description: The best AI for generating photos online

1.title: How to get a successful result?
1.info: To get a high-quality result, use images with clear boundaries between the object and the background, and also do not forget about the quality of the photo itself, the higher it is, the clearer and better the processed photo. Our service is completely free, which makes it accessible to anyone who aspires to creative image editing.

2.title: How do I change the background color?
2.info: Register on the site if you haven't already done so. Upload the image by clicking Generate now. Set up all the necessary and desired parameters for photo editing. Neurona is an artificial intelligence equipped with advanced technologies, so changing or removing the background from your photo will not be a problem. You don't have to spend hours on manual processing, allowing you to focus on the creative process.

3.title: How to use Neurona for Free?
3.info: For free editing, you just need to create an account and then follow the instructions to create the generated photo. Go to the Neurons website. Click the "Generate Now" button and select the image you want to edit. Wait for Neurons to remove the background from your image. Make the necessary changes to the image, including changing the background color. Save the edited image.

4.title: How do you generate a picture?
4.info: Open the site in your web browser. On the main page of the site, you will immediately see the "Create now" button, click on it. Select and configure all the necessary parameters that you need. Click on the button to generate an image. It will take a little of your time. Everything is ready!

5.title: How to spell promt correctly?
5.info: Promt is a key that allows you to “turn on” the neural network in the right direction. This is a carefully designed query that also directs attention to specific aspects of the data. This allows you to “tune” the neural network to perform a specific task, forcing it to focus on what is necessary, ignoring unnecessary information.

1.title: What cards can I pay with?
1.info: In order to replenish your balance you can use the following replenishment methods: Stripe, Visa and various cryptocurrency options.

2.title: What should I do if I get a bad result?
2.info: Unfortunately, we cannot always guarantee you a good result. But it depends 90% on the photo you use. All instructions on how to upload a photo can be found on the corresponding page.

IosPage.heading: Neurona App for IOS
IosPage.description: Detailed instructions on how to install the app on IOS

1.title: Open site
1.description: Open the Neurona.com website in the Safari browser

2.title: Click on the «Share» icon
2.description: Click on the «Share» icon (located on the bottom toolbar and is a rectangle with an upward pointing arrow)

3.title: Add to Home Screen
3.description: From the scrolling menu that appears, select «Add to Home Screen»

4.title: Enter a name
4.description: Enter a name for the shortcut, and then click «Add»

5.title: Done!
5.description: Once added, neurona.com will run as a web application on your home screen, offering a seamless full-screen experience without a browser address bar
